verses.verse: <S%H430>God,<s%> you are my <S%H430>God.<s%> I will earnestly <S%H7836>seek<s%> <S%H5315>you.<s%> My soul <S%H6770>thirsts<s%> for <S%H1320>you.<s%> My flesh <S%H3642>longs<s%> for <S%H6723>you,<s%> in a dry and <S%H5889>weary<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> where there is <S%H1097>no<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>
So I have <S%H2372>seen<s%> you in the <S%H3519>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H7200>watching<s%> your <S%H5797>power<s%> and your <S%H3519>glory.<s%>
Because your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H2416>life,<s%> my <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall praise <S%H7623>you.<s%>
So I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you while I <S%H2416>live.<s%> I will lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> in your <S%H8034>name.<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> as with the <S%H1880>richest<s%> <S%H2459>food.<s%> My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1984>praise<s%> you with <S%H7445>joyful<s%> <S%H8193>lips,<s%>
when I <S%H2142>remember<s%> you on my <S%H3326>bed,<s%> and <S%H1897>think<s%> about you in the night <S%H821>watches.<s%>
For you have been my <S%H5833>help.<s%> I will <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of your <S%H3671>wings.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> stays <S%H1692>close<s%> <S%H310>to<s%> <S%H3225>you.<s%> Your right hand holds me <S%H8551>up.<s%>
But those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> to <S%H7722>destroy<s%> <S%H935>it,<s%> shall go into the lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
They shall be given <S%H5064>over<s%> to the power of the <S%H3027>sword.<s%> They shall be <S%H7776>jackal<s%> <S%H4521>food.<s%>

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H430>God.<s%> Everyone who <S%H7650>swears<s%> by him will <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H6310>him,<s%> for the mouth of those who <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> shall be <S%H5534>silenced.<s%>
